overview: Nikita and Ludo are a unique couple. In love, but always playful, they live their fantasies in total complicity. So, when her husband gives her an appointment in an unknown house in the middle of the day, Nikita plays the game 100% and dresses up in her best lingerie to excite the man who, for sure, will have the chance to take her in front of her man. However, there is one thing that Nikita hates, it is when Ludo has fun scaring her by pretending to be a pervert who observes her without her knowledge. The joker will be even if he has to stay in the cold, on the wrong side of the bay window, forced to watch his darling masturbating...
title: Obsessions 6
